briefdescription.para: Opaque type for the XSBag objects.
Adds a value in the bag.

detaileddescription.para:
The new value will be retained
xsThis
The bag object
value
The value to add
void

briefdescription.para: Checks if a bag contains a value.

simplesect.para: True if the bag contains the value, otherwise false

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of values in the bag.
Initializes an empty bag with an initial capacity.

parameterdescription.para: Other values, terminated by a NULL fence

briefdescription.para: Increases the internal value pointer and returns the value.
Decrease the internal value pointer and returns the value.
Removes a value in the bag.

detaileddescription.para:
The removed value will be released
xsThis
The bag object
value
The value to remove
void

briefdescription.para: Replaces a value in the bag.

detaileddescription.para:
The old value will be released, and the new will be retained
xsThis
The bag object
valueOld
The value to replace
valueNew
The new value
void

briefdescription.para: Bags the internal value pointer to the first value in the bag.
